# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Currently, security updates are provided for the latest version of Quantic-Rust.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of Quantic-Rust seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please do NOT open a public issue. Instead, report it directly to the maintainer:

- **Email:** mdmahirlabib@gmail.com

Please include:
- A description of the vulnerability.
- Steps to reproduce (if possible).
- Potential impact.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and work with you to resolve the issue before a public disclosure.
